connectionObjects.databaseID: database id for the album being connected to
connectionObjects.creator: user ID of person who created the connection
connectionObjects.appleAlbumID: apple Album ID of the connected album
connectionObjects.title: album title of the connected album
connectionObjects.cover: cover image URL of the connected album
